Good question. I would like to know too.

metadata.topic: KB5034957: Updating the WinRE partition on deployed devices to address security vulnerabilities in CVE-2024-20666

From: 'Shimon Kerzner' via PatchManagement <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: Monday, January 15, 2024 9:20 AM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Subject: [External]RE: [patchmanagement] KB5034957: Updating the WinRE partition
on deployed devices to address security vulnerabilities in CVE-2024-20666 
I am curious if anyone tried these script on machines where the Recovery
partition is to small for the standard update?
Does it have the same space issue? The update packages themselves in the catalog
are tiny tiny? 
Thanks,
Shimon 
IntelliComp Technologies [https://www.intellicomp.net/signature/logo.png]
